Package oaidtb.boosters

Interface Summary
ErrorUpperBoundComputer Interface for boosters that can calculate any kind of theoretical guaranteed error measure upper bound (academical & validation stuff); obviously, it isn' t neccessary for the booster to work and it can be harmful for the algorithm performance, so the implementations of this interface must be carefully revised to not become a bottleneck.
IterativeUpdatableClassifier Interface for classifiers that can be updated (refined) at any time by performing more iterations
MulticlassExtensibleBooster Interface for boosters which can handle binary nominal problems and can be extended to the multiclass case using a "one-per-class" approach.
 

Class Summary
AdaBoostECC Class for boosting using AdaBoostECC.
AdaBoostM1 Class for boosting using AdaBoostM1.
AdaBoostM1W A modification of AdaBoostM1 which works better with weak base classifiers; for more information see: [1] - Günther Eibl & Karl Peter Pfeiffer How to make AdaBoost.M1 work for weak base classifiers by changing only one line of the code.
AdaBoostMH Class for boosting using Schapire & Singer's AdaBoostMH.
AdaBoostOC Class for boosting using Schapire's AdaBoostOC.
Booster Abstract class defining the structure ("iterative & interactive") and common options to our boosting implementations.
GentleAdaBoost Class for boosting using GentleAdaBoost.
RealAdaBoost Class for boosting using RealAdaBoost; it uses class probability estimates (so it needs a DistributionClassifier as base classifier) to construct real valued contributions of each base classifier.
WeightedClassifierVector Container class, type-conscious, to store classifiers with its vote weights.
